metadata.title: CVE-2024-23222 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
A type confusion issue was addressed with improved checks. This issue isfixed in tvOS 17.3, iOS 17.3 and iPadOS 17.3, macOS Sonoma 14.3, iOS 16.7.5and iPadOS 16.7.5, Safari 17.3, macOS Ventura 13.6.4, macOS Monterey12.7.3, visionOS 1.0.2. Processing maliciously crafted web content may leadto arbitrary code execution. Apple is aware of a report that this issue mayhave been exploited.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-23222` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-4.0 - 2.42.5-0ubuntu0.22.04.2
gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-4.1 - 2.42.5-0ubuntu0.22.04.2
gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-6.0 - 2.42.5-0ubuntu0.22.04.2
gir1.2-webkit-6.0 - 2.42.5-0ubuntu0.22.04.2
gir1.2-webkit2-4.0 - 2.42.5-0ubuntu0.22.04.2
gir1.2-webkit2-4.1 - 2.42.5-0ubuntu0.22.04.2
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-18 - 2.42.5-0ubuntu0.22.04.2
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-bin - 2.42.5-0ubuntu0.22.04.2
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.1-0 - 2.42.5-0ubuntu0.22.04.2
libjavascriptcoregtk-6.0-1 - 2.42.5-0ubuntu0.22.04.2
libwebkit2gtk-4.0-37 - 2.42.5-0ubuntu0.22.04.2
libwebkit2gtk-4.1-0 - 2.42.5-0ubuntu0.22.04.2
libwebkitgtk-6.0-4 - 2.42.5-0ubuntu0.22.04.2
webkit2gtk-driver - 2.42.5-0ubuntu0.22.04.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: webkit2gtk package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.42.5-0ubuntu0.22.04.2').
qtwebkit-opensource-src package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
wpewebkit package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
